about_the_game:
Join "Royal Romances: Cursed Hearts DLC" – an enchanting addition to the game that beckons you to step into a world where love and intrigue intertwine amidst the grandeur of a magical kingdom! Are you ready to escape the confines of reality and immerse yourself in the delicate role of a princess? Life within the opulent royal palace may appear idyllic, but the truth is far more complex. Unlock additional locations with magical bonus chapters and explore secret corners of enchanting kingdom!

Will you emerge triumphant in this realm teeming with danger and desire? The fate of your heart and your kingdom is yours to shape in "Royal Romances: Cursed Hearts DLC"!

💋 DISCOVER THE ABANDONED CAVE!
Explore an abandoned cave that was once used to mine crystals. You might find important secrets there!

💋 FIND OUT ABOUT WENDIGO!
Do you know who wendigos are and what they are capable of? Learn more about these creatures by breaking into the vault of knowledge!

💋 LEARN MORE ABOUT EMMETT'S EXPERIMENTS!
Dig up more information about the mad prince and find evidence of the villainous deeds he's guilty of!

💋 SEARCH THE AIR ISLAND!
You'll have to solve exciting air island puzzles to retrieve Sireus' diary!
